publicationStmt.p: Digital edition hosted on http://rickandmorty.newtfire.org and GitHub: https://github.com/dorothealint/Rick-and-Morty

encodingDesc.p: Some small changes to the original transcriptions were made including fixed spelling errors and adding names and scene cuts.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Anyway, that's how I escaped from space prison! Oh, scary place.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Wow, Rick! That's -- That's one -- one heck of a story. I sure do wish I could have been there to see it happen.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Oh, come on. Who wants to watch a mad scientist use handmade sci-fi tools to take out highly trained alien guards when we can sit here and be a family at Shoney's?

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Dad, it's great to have you back, no matter where we are, but wouldn't you like to go home?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Emotionally speaking, honey, Shoney's is my home.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Yeah, but you just got out of prison. I mean, how much of a step up from that is --

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Jerry, get out of the booth, take all your clothes off, and fold yourself 12 times.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : You got it. [ Grunting ]

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Six folds, huh? W-W-What, have you guys got me in a Series 9000? You cheap insect [bleep] didn't think I was worth your best equipment?

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : [ Chuckles ] Man, I told the money bugs. I said, "You know who this guy is, right? You want me to get intel out of the smartest mammal in the galaxy, you better give me a decent brainalyzer.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Well, you might as well order some pancakes, because I don't see the need to leave this part of my brain.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Oh, I think you do. Eventually, you're either gonna relax your cerebellum.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Shoney's.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Or the Series 9000 is going to turn it into mush.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Relaxed enough? [ Chuckles ]

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : I admire you, Rick--

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : [ Laughs ]

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : When I-- [ Farts ]

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : [ Laughs ]

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Rick, here's-- [ Farts ]

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : [ Laughs ]

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Captain
sp.p: : What's going on?

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Worker
sp.p: : It's hard to tell. He may have manifested some sort of butt.

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Captain
sp.p: : He can do that?

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Worker
sp.p: : He is the smartest man in the universe.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : [ Sighs contently ] I tell ya, the Galactic Federation taking over Earth -- best thing that's ever happened to this family. I just got my sixth promotion this week, and I still don't know what I do.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Who cares how high they promote you? Everyone just gets paid in pills.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Well, when you're not sure what you do for a living, you can make your own rules.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Summer, show your father some respect. He's pulling down a six-chewable figure income.

sp.speaker: Conroy
sp.p: : I'll get that in a moment. How are everyone's pills? Oh, Morty, you've hardly touched your pills.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : I kind of had big pills for lunch, and I [muffled] wasn't gonna eat any more pills. [ Gulps ] Thank you, Conroy.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : You spoil us, Conroy.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : [Slams hands on table] Grandpa Rick wouldn't put up with this!

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : [Bangs fist on table] Stop saying his name! He abandoned us.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : [Bangs fist on table] Willem Dafoe! Th-That's the guy I couldn't think of this morning.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Don't make my mistake, Summer. Don't deify the people that leave you. You'll end up a horse surgeon in a world controlled by aliens whose medicine keeps horses [ Sobs ] healthy forever. [ Sniffles ] Horses live longer than tortoises now. Is that what you want for yourself?

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Maybe I just want you to care if I run away yelling!

sp.speaker: Conroy
sp.p: : Who saved room for pill brûlée?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Ooh! [ Chuckles ]

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : I can see why you chose this family-friendly restaurant to represent your cerebellum. So safe, so comfortable, so Shoney's. But admit it, Rick -- you're going crazy cooped up in here. Let's go visit some memories.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Oh, any particular ones? You want to see my first boner, or should we go straight to the moment I discovered interdimensional travel?

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : [ Squeals ]

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: :' Ooh, your little flappy doodles are twitching. Does that mean you're aroused, or did you just get a signal that one of your buddies found a grape?

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : It's arousal. Yes, I'd like very much to visit the memory of you inventing your portal gun.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Yeah, well, tough titties.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : There's no tougher titty than a psychotic break, Rick.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Well, that depends on who breaks first -- me or the titty.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Someone special you remember? Is that your memory of her out there -- between where you were on 9/11 and your favorite sports blooper?

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : If we stay here, you'll die, along with all your memories. If you take me where I want to go she'll be there, too, won't she?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : The day I invented the portal gun is the day I lost her.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Oh, that sounds cool. I can get what I want and you can say goodbye.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : [ Sighs ] Fine, but I'm driving.

sp.speaker: 9/11 Memory Rick
sp.p: : --as an excuse to strip away our freedom!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Huh? What are you -- What are you doing?

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Grandpa Rick must have some secret lab, right? With, like, laser guns and jets packs and a space tank! And we can go break him out of prison! Look at these dead flies! Maybe if we arrange them in a certain order, it plays a hologram or it opens a secret door.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Summer, you're freaking me out. I know things have changed a lot, and I know you miss Rick, but getting him back wouldn't make things better. And, you know, we're not doing so bad.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : We're miserable, Morty! There's a mandatory curfew, their weird calendar made me 47, and they weaponized the Eiffel Tower!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Hey, I like being 35. I-I can rent a car now.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Because you suck! You've been keeping your lip zipped about it since Grandpa got arrested, but the fact is, you're freaking stoked to bail on him.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : He bails on everybody! He bailed on Mom when she was a kid! He -- He bailed on tiny planet! And in case I never made this clear to you, Summer, he bailed on you. He left you to rot in a world that he ruined because he doesn't care! Because nobody's special to him, Summer, not even himself. So, if you really want your grandpa back, grab a shovel. The one that won't let you down is buried in your backyard!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : You're right!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What?! No, I'm not right. I-I was using ghoulish overkill! Ghoulish overkill, Summer!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh, God! Oh, God! Whoa, whoa!

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Where are we going?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : To the day it all began and ended. The moment that changed everything.

sp.speaker: McDonald's Drive-thru speaker
sp.p: : Welcome to McDonald's. Can I take your order?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Yeah, I'd like to get a 10-piece McNugget and a bunch of the Szechuan sauce. Like, as much as you're allowed to give me. In 1998, they had this promotion for the Disney film "Mulan," where they -- where they -- they created a new sauce for the McNuggets called Szechuan sauce, and it's delicious! And then they got rid of it, and now it's gone. This is the only place we're gonna be able to try it, is in my memory.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Rick, you're doing this bit while your brain is melting.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Okay. All right, all right.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Is that--

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Me. I used to wear blue pants.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : When'd you make the leap to interdimensional travel?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I didn't. I did.

sp.speaker: Alternate Rick
sp.p: : Well, well, well. If it isn't us. You know the worst part about inventing teleportation? Suddenly, you're able to travel the whole galaxy, and the first thing you learn is, you're the last guy to invent teleportation. Fortunately, you're about to invent something much more powerful.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : [ Squeals ]

sp.speaker: Young Rick
sp.p: : What?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Summer, nobody has to know about that. We could put it right back and pretend we never saw it, like we did with Dad's mannequin leg.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Fine, stay here. I'll rescue Grandpa myself.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : And how are you gonna do that?

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : I don't know yet. I'll make it up as I go. That's what Grandpa Rick does. That's what heroes do.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Y-You want to see what a hero Rick is? I-I'll bring you somewhere, Summer. Um-

sp.speaker: Conroy
sp.p: : My goodness, children. [ Stern robotic voice ] Relinquish the illegal technology to the nearest Federation representative. [ Normal voice ] And then we'll all play Balderdash.

sp.speaker: Conroy
sp.p: : Oh, my goodness! Oh, oh! My goo-- [ Crackling ]

sp.speaker: Summer (C-137)
sp.p: : Oh, my God. I have that exact same top.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : What is this place? And what's with "Hunger Games" Summer?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : That's my sister. This used to be my home.

sp.speaker: Alternate Rick
sp.p: : Imagine doing anything you want, then hopping to a timeline where you never did it. Imagine going anywhere, anytime, with nobody able to stop you.

sp.speaker: Young Rick
sp.p: : Sounds lonely.

sp.speaker: Alternate Rick
sp.p: : Lonely? Dude, you have yourself -- your infinite selves. It's a nonstop party where all the guests are the only person we like. You think it's cool being the smartest man on Earth, but once we give you this technology, you become the smartest thing in every conceivable universe -- the Infinite Rick, a god.

sp.speaker: Young Rick
sp.p: : Eh, pass.

sp.speaker: Alternate Rick
sp.p: : Excuse me? Bro, Ricks don't pass on this. Who do you think you are?

sp.speaker: Young Rick
sp.p: : A different kind of Rick, I guess.

sp.speaker: Alternate Rick
sp.p: : Well, we'll see how long that lasts.

sp.speaker: Diane
sp.p: : I heard sci-fi noises. Did you make a breakthrough?

sp.speaker: Young Rick
sp.p: : Sort of. I just took a long look at myself, and I don't think this science thing is gonna pay off.

sp.speaker: Diane
sp.p: : Well, why don't I get Beth and we'll go out for ice cream?

sp.speaker: Young Rick
sp.p: : That, Dianne, is the last great idea that will ever be had in this garage.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Good roasted Cronenberg, I assume. Mom, you're looking feral. I can't believe Rick did this.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : These are the parts of Rick's adventures you don't get to see -- the parts he leaves behind. All right, it's been great, guys. I really only wanted to stop by here for a quick "I told ya so." So, uh--

sp.speaker: Jerry (C-137)
sp.p: : Looking for this?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What are you doing with that?!

sp.speaker: Jerry (C-137)
sp.p: : It stinks of Rick. [ Grunts ]

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : No! Why?! Why would you do that?! W-W-What is the matter with you people?!

sp.speaker: Jerry (C-137)
sp.p: : You can never leave. She cannot remain.

sp.speaker: Jerry (C-137)
sp.p: : She stinks of Rick.

body.stage: Portal opens, Ricks exits through it

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Hold your fire! Hold your fire! I'm Morty C-137.

sp.speaker: Guard Rick
sp.p: : We detected a compromised portal gun. Where is your Rick?

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : He's in prison.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Summer.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : He got captured by the Federation and we were going to rescue him.

sp.speaker: Guard Rick
sp.p: : Very troubling. We can't risk Citadel secrets falling into the Federation's hands. We'll dispatch SEAL Team Ricks immediately to break into the prison holding C-137.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Boo-yah!

sp.speaker: Guard Rick
sp.p: : Aand assassinate him.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Boo-nah?

sp.speaker: Young Rick
sp.p: : Come on, girls! The ice cream's gonna melt.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : [ Munching ]

sp.speaker: Young Rick
sp.p: : Nooooooo!

body.stage: Ball explodes, killing Diane and young Beth

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Wow. This sauce is [bleep] amazing. You said it was promoting a movie? [ Slurping ]

sp.speaker: Young Rick
sp.p: : Carry the three, add a two. I got it. I [bleep] got it.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Whoa. I-Is that it, the portal gun?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Yeah. That's the three lines of math that separates my life as a man from my life as an unfeeling ghost.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Awesome-possum. [ Whirring ] Mission Control, you getting this?

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Worker
sp.p: : Holy shit, yes! Yes, we got it!

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Yeah! Thanks, Rick. I'll try to remember to shut off the brainalyzer. Actually, I think it shuts off automatically once your brain is liquid. Don't know, don't care. Pull me out. [ Beat ] Hey, pull me out! Can you hear me?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Nope, they cannot.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Why not?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Because the code you just uploaded wasn't actually my portal-gun formula, it was a virus giving me full control over the brainalyzer.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : What are you talking about? This is a memory. Y-You can't alter details of a memory.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : True, but you can alter anything you want about a totally fabricated origin story.

body.stage: World around them turns into Shoney's

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : It's a trap! Abort! I'm still in his Shoney's! Repeat -- we never left his Shoney's!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Mission accomplished, boys. Pull me out.

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Worker
sp.p: : Roger that.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Okay, have fun in what's left of my brain. I'm gonna transfer to yours. Oh, there's not enough room for all my genius, so I'm leaving you with my fear of wicker furniture, my desire to play the trumpet, my tentative plans to purchase a hat, and six years of improv workshops. Comedy comes in threes.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : It's a trap! Abort! We never left his -- [ Farts ] [ Rick laughs ] No!

body.stage: Rick exits the machine in Cornvelious Daniel's body

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Another day, another dollar. Am I right great insect creature or whaaat?!

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Captain
sp.p: : Congratulations, Agent. You'll be highly commended for this.

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Always wait for permission to [burps] feel accomplishment. That's my motto.

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Captain
sp.p: : One thing still perplexes me -- why would Rick Sanchez turn himself in?

sp.speaker: Cornvelious Daniel
sp.p: : Well, I'm just a dumb-ass bug, but it's possible Rick knew he'd be interrogated at this facility, where we not only keep our most wanted, but our most sensitive data. Anyone here with level-nine access could [burps] I don't know, collapse a government. I'm just gonna go take a dump. Is it cool if I use the level-nine bathroom? W-W-What's the level-nine master access code again?

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Worker
sp.p: : Oh, that's easy. 8-3--

sp.speaker: SEAL Team Rick leader
sp.p: : Yeah! SEAL Team Rick's in the house!

sp.speaker: Rick(D-99)
sp.p: : Hi, Rick. Bye, Rick.

body.stage: Rick transfers his mind into D-99

sp.speaker: SEAL Team Rick leader
sp.p: : D-99, y-you okay?

sp.speaker: Rick(D-99)
sp.p: : I'm bummed I didn't get to give that insect dick a test-drive.

sp.speaker: Braided Rick
sp.p: : Wait, wait, wait, wait! T-The Council of Ricks sent us. We have your Morty and Summer. They're prisoners on the Citadel.

sp.speaker: Rick(D-99)
sp.p: : Great!

sp.speaker: Braided Rick
sp.p: : [ Grunts ]

sp.speaker: Speaker system
sp.p: : Security breach in room 6755.

sp.speaker: Rick(D-99)
sp.p: : Lovely. Not only is my plan screwed up, I also forgot how to improvise.

sp.speaker: Speaker system
sp.p: : All security people approach.

sp.speaker: Rick(D-99)
sp.p: : [ Grunts ]

sp.speaker: Speaker system
sp.p: : Security breach.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : A city of Grandpas?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : It's the Citadel of Ricks. All the different Ricks from all the different realities got together to hide here from the government.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : But if every Rick hates the government, why would they hate Grandpa?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Because Ricks hate themselves the most. And our Rick is the most himself.

sp.speaker: Guard Rick
sp.p: : Not anymore, homey. SEAL Team Ricks turned his unibrow into two brows -- with a bullet. [ Laughter ] Your Rick's dead! Your Rick's dead!

sp.speaker: Worker Rick
sp.p: : Sir, Rick D-99 is returning from the mission alone. Apparently, SEAL Team Ricks suffered heavy casualties.

sp.speaker: Commander in Chief Rick
sp.p: : Bring him in.

sp.speaker: Worker Rick
sp.p: : He says he'll only talk to a Rick with higher clearance.

sp.speaker: Commander in Chief Rick
sp.p: : La-di-da. Give me that. D-99, this is the commander in chief of the Citadel's militia.

sp.speaker: Rick(D-99)
sp.p: : Go[burps] -- good enough.

body.stage: Rick transfers his mind into Commander in Chief Rick

sp.speaker: Commander in Chief Rick
sp.p: : He's a spy. Blow him up. I'm gonna go take a shit.

body.stage: Transition to room of Council of Ricks

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : Operating an unregistered portal gun, radicalizing a Summer, conspiring with a traitorous Rick. How do you plead?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : How is this a fair trial? O-Our lawyer is a Morty.

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : It's not fair, you have no rights, and he's not a lawyer. We just keep him here because he's fun. Look at him go.

sp.speaker: "Lawyer" Morty
sp.p: : [ Laughs ] Ha ha, yeah!

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : We'll be lenient if you renounce your Rick. What say you, Summer?

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : I say [bleep] you! My grandpa was my hero. You killed him because you were jealous of him. That's pretty obvious from the haircuts. So do what you want to me, but let my brother go. He already renounced Rick.

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : Morty?

sp.speaker: "Lawyer" Morty
sp.p: : [ Whispers indistinctly ]

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What? N-No, I don't want to see your Pog collection. I don't renounce Rick, and I never have. I was just trying to protect my sister. I wanted you to have a normal life. That's something you can't have when Rick shows up. Everything real turns fake. Everything right is wrong. All you know is that you know nothing and he knows everything. And, well -- well, he's not a villain, Summer, but he shouldn't be your hero. He's more like a demon or a super [bleep]up god.

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : Let's not suck the ghost of his [bleep] too hard. He was a terrorist, and now he's dead.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh, yeah? If you think my Rick's dead, he's alive. And if you think you're safe, he's coming for you!

sp.speaker: Council of Ricks
sp.p: : [ All grumbling ]

sp.speaker: Commander in Chief Rick
sp.p: :[ Whistling ]

sp.speaker: Teleportation Worker Rick
sp.p: : Hey, whoa, whoa! What are you doing in here? This area's for teleporting the entire Citadel to somewhere else using only buttons and dials.

sp.speaker: Commander in Chief Rick
sp.p: : Yeah, well, it's a bad idea to have it designed that way then, isn't it?

sp.speaker: Teleporter Worker Rick
sp.p: : What the [bleep] We just teleported into a galactic federal prison.

sp.speaker: Commander in Chief Rick
sp.p: : I'm gonna go take a shit.

sp.speaker: "Lawyer" Morty
sp.p: : Order in the court! Whoa! What the hell?! Oh, my God!

sp.speaker: Kidnapped Morty
sp.p: : [ Screaming ]

sp.speaker: Random Rick
sp.p: : Wait, wait, wait, wait! No, no, no!

sp.speaker: Hammerhead Morty
sp.p: : Whoa! [ Screaming ] Whoa!

sp.speaker: Quantum Rick
sp.p: : The Citadel's been teleported to [burps] Federation space. It's doomed. This has to be C-137, you guys. What are we gonna do?! You know he's coming for us.

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : All right, calm down! We have his Summer as a hostage. Obviously, I get her. You guys play Rick, Laser, Scissors for the Morty.

sp.speaker: Zeta Alpha Rick
sp.p: : W-W-What the hell is that?

sp.speaker: Quantum Rick
sp.p: : Payback.

sp.speaker: Council of Ricks
sp.p: : [ Screaming ]

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Grandpa Rick!

sp.speaker: Quantum Rick
sp.p: : rips off his uniform and shakes his hair to standard Rick hair, becoming Rick

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Duh!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : You're alive!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Rick!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Morty, take this. You're gonna need it later.

sp.speaker: Ricktiminus Sancheziminius
sp.p: : Hold on, hold on. Whoa!

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : That's enough, Rick.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : What -- What's this supposed to accomplish? We have infinite grandkids. You're trying to use Disney bucks at a Caesar's Palace here.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : That's a bluff. He's bluffing, sir. He loves me.

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : You're a rogue Rick -- irrational, passionate. You love your grandkids. You came to rescue them.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I came to kill you, bro. That's not even my original Summer.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Oh, my God. He's not bluffing. He's not bluffing!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : R-Rick?

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : Why not shoot through her?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : 20 yards, nine-gauge plasma pistol, My first shot would liquify her insides and injure you, second shot adds recoil. The risk to me is minimized if I wait for you to shoot her, which I'm encouraging you to do.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : What the [bleep]

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Or let her go, which I will reward with a quicker death.

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : Because you love her!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Because it's incentive for you to give me my cleanest shot, which will be your least painful death. But if you want to die slower than that, I'm super into it. All you got to do to get that started is kill the girl.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : I hate you!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Not an issue, sweetie.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : That's enough! Drop the gun, Rick!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Morty, I know you're too stupid to get this, but you're really [bleep] this up right now.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : I'm not letting you let my sister die! Drop the gun!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I wasn't gonna let her die, you [bleep] moron!

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : Ha!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Aww.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : The point is he thought I was going to.

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : I totally did, by the way. You're a [bleep] moron, Morty.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Morty, you [bleep] idiot!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : You're a serious [bleep] idiot, Morty! You basically killed us all! You're the worst! You're as dumb as a bag of sand.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Who's stupid now, bitch?!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Morty, we just got him back!

sp.speaker: Riq IV
sp.p: : [ Laughs ] That was amazing, Morty. Oh, my God. Wow. Okay, let's wrap this-

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Good job, Morty. Let's go, kids.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : What?! What happened?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Oldest Rick trick in the book.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : "Fake gun, shoot me in standoff." Brilliant.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Ha, yeah. G-Good thing I saw that note.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Can't we just portal home?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Not until I finish what I started. And that is how you get level-nine access without a password.

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Guard
sp.p: : Freeze!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Employee of the month, ladies and gentlemen.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : So, what are you doing with level-nine access anyways?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Destroying the [burps] galactic government.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Awesome! Whoa, cool!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Awesome! Whoa, cool!

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Are you going to set all their nukes to target each other?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Ooh, or -- or reprogram their military portals to disintegrate their entire space fleet?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Good pitches, kids. I'm almost proud. But watch closely as Grandpa topples an empire by changing a one to a zero.

body.stage: Transition to Galactic Federation President's office

sp.speaker: Federation Worker 1
sp.p: :Mr. President, the Blemflarck's value just dropped to nothing.

sp.speaker: Galactic Federation President
sp.p: :What do you mean?

sp.speaker: Federation Worker 1
sp.p: :I mean, our single centralized galactic currency just went from being worth one of itself to zero of itself.

sp.speaker: Galactic Federation President
sp.p: :Calm down, people. Deploy the galactic militia and declare martial law.

sp.speaker: Federation Commander
sp.p: :Yes, sir. Uh, what should I pay them with?

sp.speaker: Federation Worker 2
sp.p: :Their payment is the honor they'll feel to serve their -- Wait. Who's paying me to yell at this guy?

sp.speaker: Federation Worker 3
sp.p: :I can answer that -- for money.

sp.speaker: Federation Worker 1
sp.p: :I never thought I'd live to see this day.

sp.speaker: Galactic Federation President
sp.p: :Gentlemen, gentlemen, gentlemen! There's a solution here you're not seeing.

body.stage: (The president shoots himself in the head)

sp.speaker: Federation Worker 3
sp.p: :Give me your jacket!

sp.speaker: Federation Worker 1
sp.p: :Give me those pants!

sp.speaker: Female Office Employee
sp.p: :There's no rich people or poor people! I want more jackets!

sp.speaker: Gromflomite Office Employee
sp.p: :He who controls the pants controls the galaxy!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : [ Whimpering ] [ Gasps ] [ Whimpering ]

sp.speaker: Mr. Goldenfold
sp.p: :No longer will the insects have domain over surface world!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : [ Whimpering ]

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Jerry, what the hell is happening?!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : The galactic government collapsed.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Are you okay?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Look, I-I'm not proud to share this, but the truth is, I just kept crawling, and it kept working. [ Gasps ] Oh, I'm glad you're okay. Are we ever going to stop paying for indulging your father? Our children, our planet, our jobs? Is there anything left to lose?

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Just each other, and I'll never let you go. And I'm so sorry I ever did this to us.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Guess who dismantled the government?

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Please don't leave me again.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I never will, baby.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : I was right. He turned himself in on purpose. It was all part of his plan!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Jerry, is there any light beer left? It's insane what you miss in prison.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Um..okay. No. No, no, no. Foot down time.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : No, you're right. Where's the vodka?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: : Beth, it's him or me!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Seems like you guys need some privacy. I'll, uh -- I'll be in the garage.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : What the [bleep] Not cool, Jerry! A man's garage is his castle.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Jerry's going to spend some time divorced.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Oh, I-I'm sorry to hear that, sweetie. I hope I had nothing to do with that.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : Oh, God, Dad, that is not your burden to bear. I feel terrible that I misjudged you. This is gonna be good for Jerry.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : For everybody.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : For everybody.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: : I better tend to Jerry before he changes his mind and doesn't move out. I will leave you two to your adventures.

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: : Oh, my God. Nancy says they're drawing and quartering aliens in the school courtyard, and it technically counts as patriotism.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Geez! Are my parents seriously gonna get divorced? All right, Rick, I'm gonna go to my --

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Not so fast, Morty. You heard your mom. We've got adventures to go on, Morty -- just you and me -- and sometimes your sister and sometimes your mom, but never your dad. You want to know why, Morty? Because he crossed me.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Okay, take it easy, Rick. T-T-That's dark.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Oh, it gets darker, Morty. Welcome to the darkest year of our adventures. First thing that's different -- no more Dad, Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh, geez.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : He threatened to turn me in to the government, so I made him and the government go away.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh [bleep]

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I've rep[burps]laced them both as the de facto patriarch of your family and your universe. Your mom wouldn't have accepted me if I came home -

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: :Oh, man.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : - without you and your sister, so now you know the real reason I rescued you. Oh! I just took over the family, Morty, and if you tell your mom -

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh, man.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : - or sister I said any of this, I'll deny it -

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : You're gonna deny it.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : - and they'll take my side because I'm a hero, Morty. And now you're gonna have to go -

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Oh.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : - and do whatever I say, Morty, forever! And I'll -- I'll go out and I'll find some more of that "Mulan" Szechuan teriyaki dipping sauce, Morty. -

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What are you talking about?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : - Because that's -- that's what this is all about, Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : Szechuan?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : That's my one-armed man! I'm not driven by avenging my dead family, Morty! That was fake. I-I-I'm driven by finding that McNugget sauce.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : McNuggets?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I want that "Mulan" McNugget sauce, Morty! That's my series arc, Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What the hell?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : If it takes nine seasons, I want my McNugget dipping sauce, Szechuan sauce, Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What are you talking about, Rick?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : That's what's gonna take us all the way to the end, Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What are you talking about?!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : Season -- Nine more seasons, Morty. Nine more seasons until I get that dipping Szechuan sauce.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What is that?!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : For 97 more years, Morty!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: : What are you talking about?!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: : I want that McNugget sauce, Morty!

sp.speaker: Tammy
sp.p: :Is it ready?

sp.speaker: Gromflomite worker
sp.p: :Yes. We can bring it online now.

sp.speaker: Tammy
sp.p: :Do it.

sp.speaker: Birdperson
sp.p: :I am Phoenixperson.

sp.speaker: Tammy
sp.p: :Phoenix Person? Is that what we settled on? I thought we all agreed on Cyberbird.

sp.speaker: Gromflomite worker
sp.p: :You said you didn't care what he was called as long as we brought him back.

sp.speaker: Tammy
sp.p: :Yeah, but Phoenixperson? Fine [bleep] it. Who cares? [ Grunts ]

sp.speaker: Phoenixperson
sp.p: :Ka-kaw!
